name: Final Invasion
description:
Hi !

Final Invasion is a very simple arcade shooter with sticker style graphics and no ending so do not expect to win.

You will need one or two a gamepads to play the game :

- P1 Start to start solo game

- P2 start to start dual game

- Back/Select to quit

This game created for educational purpose is still under development and has currently no sound (because there is no sound in space !). You can expect some bugs.

Feel free to give some feedback !
